nodes.text: Hammer of Destiny is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle between Rebel forces of the Hitak Harriers and an Imperial retrieval team on the lava plains of Turak IV in order to recover a damaged S-1 FireHawke Heavy Repulsortank of the famous Hell's Hammers regiment.

Rebel forces of the Hitak Harriers and an Imperial retrieval team battle across the lava plains of Turak IV in order to recover a damaged S-1 FireHawke Heavy Repulsortank of the famous Hell's Hammers regiment.
